channel.title: Softwares by Jonathan K. Kummerfeld
channel.description: Softwares from the website of Jonathan K. Kummerfeld

item.title: One-Endpoint Crossing Graph Parser
item.description: A range of tools related to one-endpoint crossing graphs - parsing, format conversion, and evaluation. https://github.com/jkkummerfeld/1ec-graph-parser

item.title: Coreference Error Analysis
item.description: A tool for classifying errors in coreference resolution. https://github.com/jkkummerfeld/berkeley-coreference-analyser

item.title: CCG to PST
item.description: A tool for converting CCG derivations into PTB-style phrase structure trees. https://github.com/jkkummerfeld/berkeley-ccg2pst

item.title: Parse Error Analysis
item.description: A tool for classifying mistakes in the output of parsers. https://github.com/jkkummerfeld/berkeley-parser-analyser
